snippet: After helping President Obama win re-election, his action group, renamed Organizing for Action, will raise money and rally support for his agenda.
abstract: Organizing for Action is new political operation created to advance Pres Obama’s agenda in his second term; tax-exempt organization, to be headed by Obama's former campaign manager Jim Messina, will be allowed to raise unlimited money and accept corporate contributions, but plans to disclose source of all donations.
lead_paragraph: After helping President Obama win re-election, his action group, renamed Organizing for Action, will raise money and rally support for his agenda.

headline.seo: Obama’s Campaign Machinery Turns to Promoting Policy
headline.main: Obama to Turn Campaign Machinery to Promoting Policy
headline.print_headline:
Obama Campaign Team
To Promote His Agenda
